3.1.0.name: csso
3.1.0.description: CSSO (CSS Optimizer) is a CSS minifier with structural optimisations

scripts.codestyle: jscs lib test && eslint lib test
scripts.coveralls: istanbul cover _mocha --report lcovonly -- -R dot && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | coveralls
scripts.travis: npm run codestyle-and-test && npm run coveralls
scripts.browserify: browserify -t package-json-versionify --standalone csso lib/index.js | uglifyjs --compress --mangle -o dist/csso-browser.js
scripts.gh-pages: git clone -b gh-pages https://github.com/css/csso.git .gh-pages && npm run browserify && cp dist/csso-browser.js .gh-pages/ && cd .gh-pages && git commit -am "update" && git push && cd .. && rm -rf .gh-pages
